attributes.shortDescription: Ultra-lightweight 2-person backpacking tent weighing just 2.3 lbs. Features double-wall construction with spacious vestibule and excellent weather protection. Perfect for serious backpackers seeking minimal weight without compromising durability. Includes color-coded clips for easy setup even in challenging conditions.
attributes.title: Alpine Summit 2P Ultralight Tent
attributes.description: Professional-grade ultralight shelter for serious mountaineering and backpacking adventures.
